templates.description: Rapid SCADA is an open source industrial automation platform. The out of the box software provides tools for rapid creation of monitoring and control systems.
templates.post_up_info:
Browse to http://{host-ip}/scada to access the RapidScada web interface.
Default uasername: admin
Default password: 123456
templates.note:
Browse to http://{host-ip}/scada to access the RapidScada web interface.
  • Default username: admin
  • Default password: 12345
